Screenshots¶

Home Page

Has a short summary of the purpose of the website.

Log In Page

Requires a username and password. Verifies it by checking the sqlite database called User. If it passes, user is redirected to the dashboard page. Includes a link if you forgot your password.

Sign Up Page

Requests user for an email, username, and password. Stores it in database if email is not yet taken.

Reset Request Page

A form that asks for a valid email.This page opens when you click the link “Forgot Password” located in the login page. If valid, sends the email via yagmail a token link. The token characters are randomly generated and expires in

30 minutes due to the functions in models.py. If invalid, print invalid message and prevents code from sending a request token.

This sends a token link to your email. The token expires in 30 minutes and is randomly generated. .. image:: email.png

Reset Password Page

A form that changes the password. Link can only be accessed by having a non-expired token link.

User enters a new string (password) and submits. The new password then replaces the old password in the database.

Dashboard Page

Shows additional features such as Google Calendar, Add Events, etc.

Reminders Page

This is where the To Do List is located and the user can add/remove tasks.

Resource Page

Several useful links to increase productivity and a shortcut to popular sites.

Add Events Page

Adds Events to the calendar. User inputs title, time, set alarm, and decide if they want to share the event with another user.
